title: Pixel 7a Android TB mail read unread contrast indistinguishable
creator: ef85
content: Recently the Pixel 7a Android TB mail read unread contrast has become indistinguishable. I have tried multiple troubleshooting tips, including uninstalling and reinstalling. It was fine before, i could easily tell an email was read or unread in the folder view, now I can't. Help!
